meta_description: Explore the Barnes Foundation’s renowned collection of impressionist, post-Impressionist, and modern art. Plan your visit to this Philadelphia treasure.

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

# Accessibility

## 

​Website Accessibility

We are committed to making the content on this website accessible to people with disabilities. Our efforts to improve are ongoing. If you have difficulty accessing content, please contact us by [email](mailto:info@barnesfoundation.org) and we will try to make it accessible to you. We welcome your suggestions.
